sources.title: Oblivion Verses – Urban Distribution International
sources.description: synopsis When the elderly caretaker of a remote morgue discovers the body of a young woman killed during a protest, he embarks on a magical odyssey to give her a proper burial before the militia returns.

metadata.Plot: When the elderly caretaker of a remote morgue discovers the body of a young woman killed during a protest, he embarks on a magical odyssey to give her a proper burial before the militia returns.
metadata.Actors: Juan Margallo, Tomás del Estal, Manuel Morón
